snippet: Mrs. Clinton on Thursday unleashed a new attack on Mr. Trump, saying that electing him as president would be a “historic mistake.”
abstract: Hillary Clinton, during address in San Diego, vigorously attacks Donald J Trump and declares him unfit to be president, warning that electing him would be 'historic mistake'; after grappling for weeks on how to take on Trump, Clinton seems to find her footing during sarcastic and somber speech.

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and MARK LANDLER

lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton on Thursday unleashed a new attack on Mr. Trump, saying that electing him as president would be a “historic mistake.”

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Warns That Donald Trump’s ‘Thin Skin’ Would Set Off War or Economic Crisis
headline.print_headline: Returning Fire, Clinton Scorns Trump as Unfit
